item.description:
If folks are looking for an alternative New Year's Eve event:
Four on the Floor is playing at the China Blossom in North Andover.
December 31, from 9:30 PM to 1:00 AM. There is no cover charge if you arrive before 9:30.
A buffet is available from 3-9:30 so seating will be most abundant after the dinner hours. The price for the buffet is $23.95 plus tax? The band starts at 9:30 and we will have to do our best to get a section together. If you'd like to go to eat...perhaps post a remark with your RSVP, and contact each other. I am not planning to get there much before 9 to 9:30.

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: New Year's Eve
